plot: A woman attempts to seduce a rich man so she can convince him to help him pay for her dying sister's hospital bill.
title: Angaeggin chowon
plot_es: A woman attempts to seduce a rich man so she can convince him to help him pay for her dying sister's hospital bill.
plot_en: A woman attempts to seduce a rich man so she can convince him to help him pay for her dying sister's hospital bill.
